strIntroduction: What You'll Do Immerse yourself in the city’s ancient history while also learning about Athens as it is today on this jam-packed Athens tour Learn about Athens’ history and modern-day life from a local perspective instead of a guidebook Marvel at Hadrian's Arch Visit the home of the first Olympics Witness the Greek changing of the guard Enjoy a small group tour of no more than 12 people Walk along streets lined with historical sites, from the famous to the unknown Explore secret corners of the city that you’d never find on your own Immerse yourself in the city’s ancient history while also learning about Athens as it is today on this jam-packed Athens tour Learn about Athens’ history and modern-day life from a local perspective instead of a guidebook Marvel at Hadrian's Arch Visit the home of the first Olympics Witness the Greek changing of the guard Enjoy a small group tour of no more than 12 people Walk along streets lined with historical sites, from the famous to the unknown Explore secret corners of the city that you’d never find on your own Immerse yourself in the city’s ancient history while also learning about Athens as it is today on this jam-packed Athens tour Learn about Athens’ history and modern-day life from a local perspective instead of a guidebook Marvel at Hadrian's Arch Visit the home of the first Olympics Witness the Greek changing of the guard Enjoy a small group tour of no more than 12 people Walk along streets lined with historical sites, from the famous to the unknown Explore secret corners of the city that you’d never find on your own

strIntroduction: What You'll Do Test out your vocals at the ancient theatre of Epidaurus, renowned for its exceptional acoustics. Pay homage to the emperors of classical greece in the magnificant ruins of Mycenae, Olympia and Delphi. Take a moment or a million to enjoy the stunning scenery of the Greek landscape Imagine what it was like to be an original Olympian athlete and hold that flame high Bow to the Gods at the Meteora Monasteries Experience traditional Greek cuisine in all its glory along the way Test out your vocals at the ancient theatre of Epidaurus, renowned for its exceptional acoustics.
